<page title>: New SEALED Automation Direct ATM1500T 15" Touch Monitor | eBay
description: Automation Direct ATM1500T 15.0-inch ATLAS industrial flat panel LCD monitor with 5-wire analog resistive touch screen, TFT display (24 bit, 800:1 contrast, XGA, 1024 x 768 native resolution, VESA compliant - all modes up to SXGA, 16 million colors) with DVI-D input connector. Powder-coated, steel front bezel and chassis, NEMA 4/4X/12, IP65. Package contains AC wiring connector, 6 ft. VGA cable; 6 ft. RS-232 cable and 2m USB cable for connection to touch screen. Ships with CD-ROM containing product literature and touch screen driver software for Windows 98/NT/2000/XP/Vista.
